name: 陳彥璋
objective: Laboratory work can be an inspiration, and can provide not only a firm demonstration of the fundamental principles of material behavior, but an opportunity to develop that intuitive recognition of the appropriate which is vital to the engineer.
schedule:
Specific Elements：
1.	Basic hydraulics bench
2.	Dead weight calibrator
3.	Hydrostatic pressure
4.	Pressure center
5.	Metacentric height
6.	Flow visualization
7.	Osborne Reynolds’ demostration
8.	Energy losses in pipes
9.	Impact of a jet
10.	Orifice discharge
11.	Venturi meter
12.	Flow over weir
materials: Crowe, Leger and Roberson, Engineering Fluid Mechanics, 8th Ed., Wiley.
